_metadata.course_description: Validation of a pharmaceutical manufacturing process is an essential requirement with respect to compliance with Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP).
learning_outcomes: Describe the validation concepts and apply them for validation of pharmaceutical manufacturing facilities, equipment and processes.

Assess process and mechanical design of pharmaceutical manufacturing facilities and evaluate their compliance with the process needs, with Good Manufacturing Practices and other applicable regulations.
Select critical quality attributes of pharmaceutical products and critical process parameters that need to be controlled in order to produce quality products.
Effectively communicate results of their assignments and research about pharmaceutical manufacturing in oral presentations and in written reports.
